title: Holloway Has What You Are Looking For In a 2B2B  Near Apple!
posting_body: ['Holloway', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '20200 Lucille Avenue Cupertino, CA 95014', 'Plan 2AR  2 \xa0bed / 2 bath / 1147 Sq.', 'Ft / From $4,325', '* Unit 097 - Available 08/06/22', '* Unit 067 - Available 08/16/22', '* Unit 091 - Available 08/23/22', 'Welcome Home to Holloway Apartments!', 'As you enter this expansive two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment now available at Holloway Apartments in the heart of Silicon Valley, you notice the designer touches in the wood-plank flooring and quartz countertops in the gourmet kitchen.', 'The luxury continues in the spacious living area and huge glass doors that lead to your own veranda.', 'The two bedrooms boast abundant closet space with the larger bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom.', 'With its convenient location, you can leave the office and arrive home in time for a workout before dinner in the 24-hour fitness center or take a dip in the sparkling resort-style pool.', 'At Holloway Apartments, your relaxation options are endless.', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'For more information, contact the friendly staff now.', 'Floor Plan/Unit Amenities:', '* Patio/Bal - Large', '* Stainless steel appliances', 'Property Amenities:', '* Playground', '* Fitness Center', '* Clubhouse', '* Covered Parking', '* Large pool (Olympic size)', '* P/T security guard', '* Walk to bus line', '* Excellent access', '* Community gas grill/BBQ area', 'Lease Terms:', 'Variable', 'Parking:', 'Type', '- Covered Lot Parking', 'Covered parking available for free.', 'Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'We welcome up to 3 pets per household with a $200 per pet deposit and $65 per pet monthly pet rent.', 'Cats and dogs are welcomed without weight restrictions though certain breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more details on our pet policy.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Sunday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Management Company:', 'Prometheus Real Estate Group, Inc.*', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x818', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
